needs: Seeks part-time (20h/wk) roles delivering measurable product outcomes by clarifying outcomes, constraints, and signals; in the first 90 days to discover context, design a pragmatic architecture/process, deliver a thin vertical slice, instrument metrics and iterate. Constraints include limited hours, cross-functional alignment, governance/auditability, and embedded privacy/security requirements.
personality: Communicates empathetically with a coaching-led approach, preferring concise narrative docs, decision logs, and short demos to align stakeholders. Values reliability, velocity and craft, favors experiments and prototypes over debates, writes readable code, removes unnecessary complexity, and enforces SLOs and runbooks. Mentors peers through pairing and transparent trade-off discussions.
